title: Strike on Girls’ School Kills 115, Iranian State Media Says
summary_full: Videos and images verified by The New York Times showed that at least half of the school was destroyed. It was not immediately clear why the school was hit, or which country’s forces had fired at it.
summary_public: Videos and images verified by The New York Times showed that at least half of the school was destroyed. It was not immediately clear why the school was hit, or which country’s forces had fired at it.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Strike on Girls’ School Kills 115, Iranian State Media Says
